title: Official NFL Branding Font
content:
There has to be some designers who also happen to be (American) football fans out there somewhere…

As part of the redesign/update of the NFL logo before the start of the last season, the league also implemented (I think) the same typeface in all of their branding for sub-logos, website, etc. etc…

I believe it's a proprietary font, but does anyone out there know this one? Also, sorry if this is a repeat question on the forum.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [new+nfl+logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225212513/http:/typophile.com/files/new+nfl+logo.jpg) | 16.78 KB |
| [nfl-2008-kickoff-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225212513/http:/typophile.com/files/nfl-2008-kickoff-logo.jpg) | 7.31 KB |

author: Josh_NJD

comments.content: Nice. Thanks. This one had been bugging me for over a year now…
